Description: Twist’s tools are helping researchers to fight cancer at multiple steps on the path to disease treatment - from basic research, to drug development and disease monitoring. Join us to hear how these tools have enabled more powerful dual guide CRISPR screens to further our understanding of cancer treatment. Learn why Twist tools are the choice for research and development of NGS-based liquid biopsy tests. And finally hear why Twist’s world leading DNA synthesis platform enables our partners to discover potential new drug molecules or diagnostic assays.
SearchResultBody: ESP08. Twist Biosciences: The Good Fight: Precision, Performance, and Partnership for Cancer Research Pioneers
Title: Twist Biosciences: The Good Fight: Precision, Performance, and Partnership for Cancer Research Pioneers
